message: I'm excited to offer you this exceptional product! It's one of the best I've got, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $10000. It's a steal at this price, and I'm sure you won't find a better deal anywhere else. What do you say? Will you take it off my hands?
